mapper.select: select name, id, password, 'ROLE_USER' as auth, u.account_Expired as accountExpired, u.account_locked as accountLocked, u.cre_expired as creExpired, u.enabled as enabled from member_tbl2 m, user_mng_tbl2 u where id = #{id} and u.user_id = m.id
mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl2(id, password, name, phone, email, reg_dt, mod_dt, del_yn, nickName, address) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, sysDate, sysDate, 'n', #{nickName}, #{address})
insert into user_mng_tbl2(user_id, account_expired, account_locked, cre_expired, enabled) values(#{id}, 1,1,1,1)
